topic.title: Update Application Lifecycle Service with Gnu C Library (glibc) patch

body.p: Of the ALS images, only the constructor images are affected by the glibc vulnerabillity. However, updating all of the images is important to stay current. In order to update to the images with the glibc patch, please update to 2.0.0.577.

ul.li: Updating follows the same steps as ALS installation found here: Install the Application Lifecycle Service (ALS)

body.p: The following two actions need to be taken for running components before update:

ol.li: Apply the latest security patches for the Ubuntu operating system of your ALS cluster nodes.
Apply the docker image update found here: Best Practices: To Update the Docker Image
